price: ߣߎ߯ߤߎ߲߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߍ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߐ߬ߟߐ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߊ߬ߡߎߘߊ ߟߎ߬
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
